synopsis.text: Nagisa and Miho are two young women who cross paths with the unlucky-in-love Fuguno Masuo in the hilarious tale of Yume de Aetara. Masuo, having never had a girlfriend throughout high school and college, is devastated when a fortune teller predicts eternal solitude for him. But when he encounters the captivating Nagisa, his heart stirs for the first time. In order to win her affections, Masuo must face stiff competition from the dashing Kaizuka and the wealthy real-estate broker Kujira. However, Masuo's penchant for finding himself in awkward situations with other women at the most inopportune moments may hinder his quest for love. Will Masuo's romantic misadventures finally lead him to find true love, or will his ill-timed encounters continue to thwart his attempts? Join Masuo, Nagisa, and Miho in Yume de Aetara to discover the answer!
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
